QuestData.Title: Eyes and Ears: Malaka'jin
QuestData.Description: Honor's Stand has been lost. The Horde's grip on the Barrens shattered along with the land itself. I now receive reports that we are at risk of losing Malaka'jin to a concerted attack by the Alliance and the Grimtotem. If Malaka'jin falls, half of Stonetalon falls with it!$B$BYou have proven yourself a capable soldier of the Horde. Will you be my eyes and ears at Malaka'jin? Witch Doctor Jin'Zil awaits your arrival.$B$BMalaka'jin is located far to the south.
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Witch Doctor Jin'Zil at Malaka'jin in Stonetalon Mountains.
